titleStmt.title: The apology of Robert Tichborn and John Ireton. Being a serious vindication of themselves and the good old cause, from the imputations cast upon them and it by the triumphing city and nation in this their day of desertion.
titleStmt.author: Tichborne, Robert, Sir, d. 1682.
Ireton, John, Sir, 1615-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for every body but the light-heel'd apprentices and head-strong masters of this wincing city of London,

notesStmt.note: Bound with items in the Thomason Tracts collection dated March 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: every body but the light-heel'd apprentices and head-strong masters of this wincing city of London
